__e: But the town constable will come in here one day, catch you up on your sins, and you'll spend your life in state prison.
Finally I gave and bequeath my soul into my Maker's hands, humbly asking forgiveness for all my sins, and hoping that I have not done wrong in the perplexity of my last hour in this strange place.
Then He closed His eyes and died for the sins of the whole world.
"We're here," they say, "to declare our contrition over the sins of the world."
The son has to pay for the sins of the father.
And all your father's spoken sins because of you?
She pays for her daughter's sins!
A river and a woman both lead their lives, washing away the dirt of other.
For yesterday's sins, yes, but not for tomorrow's.
Jesus had to die for our sins so that God could be just and merciful at the same time.
Accept this body of Jesus who gave you life for you and your sins, to strengthen you in faith for all eternity.
And there will be new sins, for which we ask the gift of better and firmer and purer hearts.
I may have committed bigger sins than other humans, but just because I'm different is not a reason to send me to hell.
- Run! At least you'll end the year well!
"The sins that you do by two and two, you must pay for one and one."
Jesus came down to earth to rid humanity of its sins to suffer, the Son of God, like a simple mortal.
LEARNING THE SINS OF HIS YOUNGEST DAUGHTER AT FULL VOLUME.
Sins of the flesh, my friend...
